casebody.data:
State
v.
Charles Everette Hinton 449P11-14 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Charles E. Hinton, for Hinton, Charles Everette. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of August 2016 by Defendant for Judicial Notice of Adjudicative Facts: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016." Ervin, J. recused
